title: Map Sampler, "Map of New York in 1839", 1936
medium:
Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
Technique: running and satin stitches on plain weave
provenance: Ex. coll. Fraser-Martin. Done by Jane G. Fraser in 1936.
dimensions: Frame H x W: 40 x 62.9 cm (15 3/4 x 24 3/4 in.)
creditline: Gift of Myra M. and William H. Mathers
description: A map of New York in 1839, embroidered in pale colored silks on white satin.

tombstone.epitaph:
Map Sampler, "Map of New York in 1839", 1936.
1936. Medium: silk embroidery on silk foundation
